1.details: 1. Verify if the code is already in a GitHub repository. 2. Check for any existing GitHub Actions workflows.

2.details: 1. Update the vite.config.ts to support GitHub Pages' base path requirements. 2. Ensure router paths are properly configured for sub-directory hosting.

3.details: 1. Create a GitHub Actions workflow file (.github/workflows/deploy.yml) to build and deploy the app. 2. Configure the workflow to deploy to GitHub Pages.

4.details: 1. Commit the new configuration files. 2. Push the changes to the GitHub repository.

5.details: Configuration complete - manual GitHub authentication required for final push
